name: Jungle Dinosaurs Hunting 3D
description:
Jungle Dinosaurs Hunting is a sniper shooting game in which your main objective is search for dangerous and killer dinosaurs and shoot them and kill them. Dino hunting is real thrill and fun for hunting players.. Become a deadly sharp shooter; enter to the dark forest to hunt or kill the huge dinosaurs with test your best sniper skills and show your real assassination experience.
Eliminate them one by one quietly. You need to complete the task in the given specific limited time. Kill dinosaur and collect cash to easily unlock the more missions.

FEATURES:
-Best sniper hunting experience
-Realistic first person shooting game
-Stunning graphic
-Hunting different dinosaurs
